---
title: "Downloads crime data from NYC Open Data"
output: html_document
author: Jennah Gosciak
date: "2022-11-07"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(sf)
```
```{r}
# load the arrests
ar <- read_csv("../00_data/arrests_2017_2019.csv")
ar %>% 
  head()
ar_sf <- ar %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords=c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
```
```{r}
# load shootings
st <- read_csv("../00_data/shootings_2017_2019.csv")
st %>% 
  head()

st_sf <- st %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
```

```{r}
cp <- read_csv("../00_data/complaints_2017_2019.csv")
cp %>% 
  head()

cp_sf <- cp %>% 
  filter(!is.na(longitude) & !is.na(latitude)) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("longitude", "latitude"), crs = 4326)
```

```{r}
# load oz data
nyc_oz <- st_read("../00_data/nyc_oz.geojson")
```


```{r}
nyc_oz %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(fill = DESIGNATED)) +
  theme_void()
```


```{r}
# spatial joins
ar_oz <- ar_sf %>% 
  st_join(nyc_oz, left=FALSE)

ar_oz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>% 
  summarize(n = n())

ar_oz %>% 
  head()
```

```{r}
st_oz <- st_sf %>% 
  st_join(nyc_oz, left = FALSE)

st_oz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>% 
  summarize(n = n())

st_oz %>% 
  head()
```
```{r}
cp_oz <- cp_sf %>% 
  st_join(nyc_oz, left = FALSE)

cp_oz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>% 
  summarize(n = n())

cp_oz %>% 
  head()
```


```{r}
# write data
ar_oz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  write_csv("../00_data/ar_oz.csv")

ar_oz %>% 
  st_write("../00_data/ar_oz.geojson",
           delete_dsn = TRUE)
```

```{r}
st_oz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  write_csv("../00_data/st_oz.csv")

st_oz %>% 
  st_write("../00_data/st_oz.geojson",
           delete_dsn = TRUE)
```

cp_oz %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  write_csv("../00_data/cp_oz.csv")
